SCN-SRK-001-3.GROUP-TAG-MSG:
The tag includes the applicants in the following sequence. 
Please uncheck the box if the applicant is not present.

SCN-SRK-001-4.PRIV-POLICY-HEADER: Please scroll down and read the Privacy Policy. Tick the check box and press “Confirm” button to proceed to next step.
SCN-SRK-001-4.PRIV-POLICY-PAR: The Government of the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region ("the Government") is concerned to ensure that all personal data submitted through Self-service Registration Kiosk ("SRK") are handled in strict adherence to the relevant provisions of the Personal Data (Privacy) Ordinance (PD(P)O).
SCN-SRK-001-4.COLLECTION-INFO-PAR: This Government will record the visits to SRK by using cookies and page tagging without collecting any personal identifiable information of users.
SCN-SRK-001-4.COOKIES-PAR:
A cookie is a small amount of data created in a computer when a person visits a website on the computer. It often includes an anonymous unique identifier. A cookie can be used to identify a computer. It, however, is not used to collect any personal information. In other words, it does not have the function of identifying an individual user of the website.

Cookies are used by the Government to collect statistics about the number of visits of users to SRK and the users' preference of websites and online services offered on SRK.

You may choose to accept or reject cookies. If you reject the cookies, you will not be able to use some of the functions of SRK, such as saving your preferences in using the SRK and accessing some online services on SRK.
SCN-SRK-001-4.PAGE-TAGGING-PAR:
Javascript and pixel tags are used to collect statistics on customer usage patterns of SRK and Government online services offered on SRK; and for tracking the performance of our online advertisements. A pixel tag is a transparent image placed on certain webpages to collect data on user activities. The collected data are aggregated and analysed for measuring the effectiveness, improving the usability of SRK and the services / online advertisements provided on SRK. No personal or identifiable information about a visitor would be collected.

You may disable JavaScript on your computer. Disabling JavaScript should not affect your access to SRK, but you will not be able to use some of the SRK functions, such as changing text size and accessing Government online services offered through SRK.
SCN-SRK-001-4.PROVISION-PERSONAL-DATA-PAR:
For different purposes and at different times you may be invited to provide personal data to the Government through SRK on a voluntary basis. Personal information may include name, telephone number, mailing address or e-mail address. The Government will specify the collection purpose and intended usage of your data when it invites you to provide such information and advise you how you may request access to or correction of the personal data provided.

Unless permitted or required by law, the Government will not disclose your personal data to any third parties without your prior consent.

 SRK uses SSL protocol to encrypt data during network transmission to protect your personal data. All personal data you provide to the Government via SRK are secured, and access to them is restricted to authorised personnel only.
SCN-SRK-001-4.SEARCH-SERVICE-PAR: Search service on SRK is provided by an independent contractor of the Government. We are advised by the independent contractor that it does not collect personal identifiable information while serving search results through SRK. The independent contractor will share the anonymous data it collects through the search service with the Government for compiling traffic analysis on government websites. The Government will not match the data obtained from any such search activity with any personal data possibly held by the Government.
SCN-SRK-001-4.PRIV-POLICY-AGREE: I have read and agree to the above Privacy Policy.

SCN-SRK-009-1.STATEMENT-PURP-HEADER: Please scroll down and read the Statement of Purpose.  Tick the check box and press “Confirm” button to proceed to next step.
SCN-SRK-009-1.STATEMENT-PURP-AGREE: I have read and agree to the above Statement of Purpose.
SCN-SRK-009-1.PURP-ITEM-1: 1.	The personal data furnished in the application will be used by Immigration Department, the Government of the HKSAR for one or more of the following purposes:─
SCN-SRK-009-1.PURP-ITEM-1-A: (a)	 to process your application for registration and application for an identity card under the Registration of Persons Ordinance (Chapter 177) and its subsidiary Regulations;
SCN-SRK-009-1.PURP-ITEM-1-B: (b)	 to enable the Registrar of the High Court to compile a provisional list of jurors under the Jury Ordinance (Chapter 3);
SCN-SRK-009-1.PURP-ITEM-1-C: (c)	 to enable the Registration and Electoral Office to revise the electoral register;
SCN-SRK-009-1.PURP-ITEM-1-D: (d)	 to exercise the powers and carry out the duties under the Registration of Persons Ordinance (Chapter 177) and its subsidiary Regulations including disclosure of information as permitted in writing by the Chief Secretary for Administration by virtue of section 11 of the Registration of Persons Ordinance;
SCN-SRK-009-1.PURP-ITEM-1-E: (e)	 to administer/enforce relevant provisions of the Immigration Ordinance (Chapter 115) and Immigration Service Ordinance (Chapter 331), and to assist in the enforcement of any other Ordinances and Regulations by other government bureaux and departments through   carrying out immigration control duties;
SCN-SRK-009-1.PURP-ITEM-1-F: (f)	 to serve statistical and research purposes on the condition that the resulting statistics or results of the research will not be made available in a form which will identify the data subjects or any of them; and
SCN-SRK-009-1.PURP-ITEM-1-G: (g)	for any other legitimate purposes as may be required, authorised or permitted by law.
SCN-SRK-009-1.PURP-ITEM-1-PAR: The provision of personal data is obligatory for registration under the Registration of Persons Regulations (Chapter 177A). Any person who without reasonable excuse, fails to comply with the statutory requirement shall be guilty of offences under the Ordinance. In addition, if you do not provide sufficient information, we would not be able to process your application.
SCN-SRK-009-1.CLASS-OF-TRANSFEREES-ITEM: 2.	 The personal data you provide may be disclosed to government bureaux, departments and other organisations for the purposes mentioned in paragraph 1 above.
SCN-SRK-009-1.ACCESS-PERSONAL-DATA-ITEM-1: 3.	 You have a right to request access to and correction of your personal data as provided for in sections 18 and 22 and Principle 6 of Schedule 1 of the Personal Data (Privacy) Ordinance (Chapter 486). Your right of access includes the right to obtain a copy of your personal data provided in this form subject to payment of a fee.
SCN-SRK-009-1.ACCESS-PERSONAL-DATA-ITEM-2: 4.	 Enquiries concerning the personal data collected by means of this form, including making of access and corrections, should be addressed to:─
SCN-SRK-009-1.ACCESS-PERSONAL-ADDR:
Executive Officer (Registration of Persons) Support 
			12/F Immigration Tower, 
			7 Gloucester Road, Wanchai, Hong 
			Kong Tel: 2829 3429
SCN-SRK-009-1.ENQUIRIES-ITEM-S1: 5.	If you have any enquiry, please refer to the Immigration Department website:
SCN-SRK-009-1.ENQUIRIES-ITEM-S2: . You may also call our enquiry hotline at  2824 6111, or send your questions to our Information and Liaison Section by fax at 2877 7711 or email at
